sentence: Looking at units outstanding versus one week prior within the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel, the biggest outflow was seen in the PowerShares S&P 500 Quality Portfolio ( SPHQ ), where 11,900,000 units were destroyed, or a 23.0% decrease week over week.
Among the largest underlying components of SPHQ, in morning trading today Home Depot ( HD ) is up about 1.8%, and McDonald's ( MCD ) is higher by about 1.6%.

And on a percentage change basis, the ETF with the biggest outflow was the PowerShares S&P 500 Value Portfolio ( SPVU ), which lost 50,001 of its units, representing a 33.3% decline in outstanding units compared to the week prior.
Among the largest underlying components of SPVU, in morning trading today JP Morgan Chase & Company ( JPM ) is up about 2.1%, and Bank of America Corporation (BAC) is up by about 3%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
